name: Courtyard by Marriott Cypress Anaheim/Orange County

reviews.text: This hotel is a perfect place to stay if you come to Long Beach for a Dragon Boat competition or just to take your family to Disneyland etc... The hotel is situated in a very convenient location, the lobby is an awesome place to hangout or just walk to restaurants nearby to wind down from a busy day. The staffs are friendly and very professional; if you need a great group rate, just talk to the Sales manager, you wouldn't be able to find a better deal for a place like this anywhere else in the neighbor hood.
reviews.title: Best place to stay for business or leisure

reviews.text: Lana Walther
reviews.title: Clean and Comfortable

reviews.text: AZ Dragon Riders' Captain
reviews.title: Absolutely Great Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just stayed for 2 nights with a large group and everything was great! I was very impressed by the lobby area, which included lots of comfortable seating, computer access, a bar and a cafe. The cafe serves Starbucks coffee, which is always a bonus for me. The staff was friendly and attentive. The location was convenient for us getting to Knott's Berry Farm and there was a good selection of restaurants and stores near by.
reviews.title: Great Staff

reviews.text: Have been staying here for over 2 1/2 years. Hotel is always clean, quiet, and a pleasure to stay at.
reviews.title: Best place to stay

reviews.text: I have stayed at this property twice now and simply can’t believe how nice the staff is. If you have business in this area or if you want to visit Disney- stay at this hotel. The staff at the Bistro is so warm and friendly and fun to talk to that you will actually WANT to spend your evening at the hotel. The front office staff is also very, very good. The only complaint I have is that I asked if the hotel could shuttle me to Disney and was promised that someone will get back to me on that but no one did. Not a big deal. Overall, one of my best experiences at a Marriott.
reviews.title: Friendliest Folks you could ever find!

reviews.text: I recently stayed here for one night as my company has it's main office nearby. I really enjoyed it. First, the staff was very nice and accomodating and made you feel welcome. Second, the bistro is very nice, has very good food, and the people again are very nice. I ended up having dinner here the first night, breakfast and dinner again on the second day. The hotel did endless favors for me - let me check out late, let me borrow a towel to go to the local 24 hour fitness club, and kept my luggage. Lastly, the room was nice and the bed comfortable. I highly recommend this proprerty.
reviews.title: Interview Stay
Simply the best
reviews.text: Thank you.

reviews.title: This road warrior "likes" the Marriott Cypress
reviews.text: I travel quite a bit for both business and pleasure. I should also say that I am a Marriott Rewards member. The Courtyard Cypress is quite simply the best. The customer service was extraordinary. Every time I entered I was greeted with a smile. The few needs I had were met and exceeded. This was true at all times during the day. Any time I am in LA, I will use this property.

Southern CA can be a roll of the dice when it comes to hotels. Some very chic, some good and basic and then some that are very scary. So as I drove down Katella looking for the Courtyard I held my breath and truly hoped for a decent place - in a city I'd n e v e r visited and had no family, no less. As it came into view, I may have actually.....smiled.
reviews.title: Wonderful Staff

reviews.text: The lobby has been refreshed (with the exception of the restaurant/bistro area). The rest of the property is about due. I wouldn't stay at full price but visiting a local customer and their negotiated discount was acceptable. Staff pleasant and helpful. No courtesy van to airport. An average property.
reviews.title: Average Marriott Property

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On a whim we decided to take a weekend and go to Disneyland. I read over several reviews of hotels in the area and decided that a little drive was better than paying double (or more) for a room that was walking distance from the park. The staff here was very friendly and informative. They even called our room after check to be sure that it was acceptable. We have stayed here a couple of times now and it will always be my first choice when in the area.
reviews.title: Favorite Place to Stay

reviews.text: As a platnium member of Marriott, I have stayed in many Courtyards and other brands of Marriott but I have never seen any bed bugs. I actually saw and killed a couple then put one in a plastic bag alive so that the front desk could see it. They sent me to another local Hotel and refunded my money but I am really getting concerned with the Marriott brand and how some of it's hotels across the country are not, by any means, living up to what the Marriott brand use to stand for. SCARY!
reviews.title: Beware of Bed Bugs

reviews.text: We called the Courtyard about midnight, the place we had planned to stay was too dirty and horrible. My husband had to work the next morning and they let us check in at 8am. We were greeted with respect, concern for our travel problem and all staff were polite and nice.
reviews.title: Great place to stay. They care about their guests.

reviews.text: The breakfast and lounge areas are quiet and comfortable. You can relax, the food served is good, there is a market store to get anything you need. The staff asked how I was doing each day, a very caring attitude. Clean and quiet. Thank you for coming to our help and Thanks again.
reviews.title: Breakfast with the Boss

reviews.text: Her name was Cathy. She was very nice and kind.
reviews.title: Front staff was very nice.

reviews.text: I really want to stay here again.
reviews.title: helpful front desk staff

reviews.text: Just one thing was my room was little dark though, but it was OK.
reviews.title: Okay

reviews.text: You guys have to ask to Cathy if you want to get a great service.
reviews.title: A MUST STAY!!! GREAT STAFF, SERVICE AND A BEAUTIFUL PLACE TO REST YOUR HEAD!

reviews.text: the front desk staff- silena, alicia and nicole are super helpful
reviews.title: Superb Service Above And Beyond

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Cypress Anaheim/Orange County Hotel
